00022 #ifndef GENDERCALLS_H
00023 #define GENDERCALLS_H
00024 
00025 //
00026 #include "chipstream/BioTypes.h"
00027 //
00028 #include <cstring>
00029 #include <string>
00030 #include <vector>
00031 //
00032 
00033 /**
00034  * @brief Class for determining gender from a cel set of cel files.
00035  */
00036 class GenderCalls {
00037 
00038 public:
00039 
00040   /** 
00041    * Get the genders for the cel files that have been seen.
00042    * @return - vector of gender calls, one for each cel file in order seen.
00043    */
00044   virtual std::vector<affx::Gender> getGenders() = 0;
00045 
00046   std::string getGenderName() { return m_GenderName; }
00047   std::string getGenderDescription() { return m_GenderDescription; }
00048 
00049   virtual ~GenderCalls(){}
00050 
00051 protected:
00052   std::string m_GenderName;
00053   std::string m_GenderDescription;
00054   
00055 };
00056 
00057 /**
00058  * @brief Instance of GenderCalls which provides unknown genders
00059  */
00060 class NoGenderCalls : public GenderCalls {
00061 
00062 public:
00063     NoGenderCalls(int numberChips) {
00064         m_GenderCalls.resize(numberChips);
00065         for(size_t i=0; i<m_GenderCalls.size(); i++)
00066             m_GenderCalls[i] = affx::UnknownGender;
00067         m_GenderName = "none";
00068         m_GenderDescription = "no gender calls - assume unknown";
00069     }
00070     std::vector<affx::Gender> getGenders() { return m_GenderCalls; }
00071 
00072 private:
00073     std::vector<affx::Gender> m_GenderCalls;
00074 };
00075 
00076 #endif /* GENDERCALLS_H */
